name: All-Terrain Driver
description: Do not suffer usual penalties for driving through difficult terrain when using Driving.

name: Apothecary
description: When a patient under your character's care heals wounds from natural rest they heal additional wounds equal to twice your character's ranks in Apothecary.

name: Armor Master
description: When wearing armor increase total soak value by 1.

name: Black Market Contacts
description: When purchasing illegal goods may reduce rarity by 1 per rank of Black-Market Contacts increasing cost by 50 percent of base cost per reduction.

name: Basic Combat Training
description: Character gains Brawl Ranged (Heavy) or Ranged (Light) as a career skill.

name: Bought Info
description: Spend currency equal to fifty times difficulty to automatically succeed on knowledge check with one uncanceled success instead of rolling.

name: Brace
description: Remove setback per rank from next skill check based on changing conditions inclement weather unstable surfaces zero gravity heavy gravity or other disruptive physical obstacles.

name: Bullrush
description: After using maneuver to engage target spend advantages or triumph to knock target prone and move them one range band away.

name: Call 'Em
description: Do not add setback to combat checks due to use of Aim maneuver.

name: Challenge!
description: Once per encounter choose adversaries within short range no greater than character's ranks. Until encounter ends they add setback targeting you and two setbacks targeting others.

name: Clever Retort
description: Once per encounter add automatic help to another character's social skill check.

name: Component Casting
description: When casting spell consume physical item and add setback to check. Item must be thematically appropriate and subject to GM's approval.

name: Construction Specialist
description: Remove one setback per rank from checks to construct bases defense works positions fortifications tunnels bunkers and similar projects.

name: Cosmopolitan Upbringing
description: Character gains Streetwise or Knowledge (Culture) as career skill. Spend advantages to heal 3 strain when using these skills to resolve conflicts between different species.

name: Corporate Drone
description: Character gains Knowledge (Society) or Negotiation as career skill. Once per session collect small favor from corporation member even if they don't owe favor.

name: Creative Design
description: As part of successful crafting check apply advantages equal to ranks in Creative Design. GM may apply equivalent help.

name: Custom Code
description: Choose icebreaker or piece of ice owned. Add success to results when using chosen icebreaker or add help when others attempt to override it.

name: Custom Rig
description: Increase ice or icebreakers on chosen computer by 1 per rank of Custom Rig.

name: Customer Service Experience
description: After Charm check suffer 1 strain to cancel help equal to ranks in Customer Service Experience.

name: Dark Insight
description: When spell adds quality with rating from Knowledge (Lore) may use Knowledge (Forbidden) instead.

name: Data Miner
description: Once per session before knowledge skill check use Computers skill instead.

name: Deep Pockets
description: Once per session produce small but narratively useful item from pockets or backpack. Generally less than 100 credits and encumbrance 0-1.

name: Defensive Sysops
description: When defending computer system add two setbacks to opponent's checks. Automatically aware of intrusion if have access.

name: Desperate Recovery
description: Before healing strain at end of encounter if strain exceeds half threshold heal two additional strain.

name: Diplomatic Instruction
description: Character gains Leadership or Negotiation as career skill. Spend advantages to heal 3 strain when convincing allies.

name: Disenfrancisto
description: Character gains Streetwise or Survival as career skill. Once per session collect small favor from another Disenfrancisto.

name: Duelist
description: Add setback to melee checks while engaged with single opponent. Add setback to melee checks while engaged with three or more opponents.

name: Dungeoneer
description: After Perception Vigilance or Knowledge (Adventuring) check cancel uncanceled help no greater than ranks in caverns subterranean ruins or similar.

name: Durable
description: Reduce Critical Injury result by 10 per rank to minimum 01.

name: Elementalist
description: Choose one attack spell effect element (Fire Ice Impact Lightning). Always add chosen effect without increasing difficulty. Never add other three effects.

name: Emergency Thruster Burn
description: Once per round increase or decrease starship speed by 1. Starship suffers 2 system strain.

name: Emergency Vacuum Training
description: Do not count zero-gravity as difficult terrain. Hold breath for rounds equal to twice Brawn. Suffer 2 wounds per round in vacuum.

name: Ensorcelled
description: If have one rank in magic skill once per encounter add success to next social skill check. Appearance subtly enhanced by magic.

name: Extra Ammo
description: Cannot run out of ammo due to despair. Limited Ammo quality items run out normally.

name: Familiar Sky
description: Once per session make Hard Knowledge check to reveal current environment type and useful information.

name: Finesse
description: When making Brawl or Melee (Light) check use Agility instead of Brawn.

name: Fires of Conviction
description: Must be Gashlai N'orr or have allegiance to Yin Brotherhood Argent Flight or Keleres. Reroll failed fear checks.

name: Forager
description: Remove up to two setbacks from checks to find food water or shelter. Forage checks take half normal time.

name: Former Professor
description: Character gains one Knowledge skill as career skill. Once per session collect small favor from institute member.

name: Grit
description: Each rank increases strain threshold by one.

name: Hamstring Shot
description: Once per round perform ranged combat check against non-vehicle target. If successful halve damage and immobilize until end of next turn.

name: Hand on The Throttle
description: Once per round increase or decrease vehicle speed by 1.

name: Historical Record
description: Must be Winnu or have allegiance to Empyrean or Nomad. Once per session succeed on knowledge check with three successes.

name: Hidden Storage
description: Gain hidden storage in vehicles or equipment holding items with encumbrance equal to ranks.

name: Iaijutsu Training
description: First time during encounter drawing Melee weapon increase weapon damage by 2 for remainder of turn.

name: Jump Up
description: Once per round stand from prone or seated position as incidental.

name: Knack for It
description: Select skill. Remove two setbacks from checks using this skill. Cannot select combat or magic skills.

name: Knockout Punch
description: Add Stun quality to Brawl checks with rating equal to two plus ranks in Coordination.

name: Know Somebody
description: Once per session reduce rarity of legal item by one per rank.

name: Knowledge Specialization
description: Choose Knowledge skill. Spend triumph to gain additional successes equal to ranks.

name: Life on the Streets
description: Character gains Skulduggery or Deception as career skill. Spend advantages to heal 3 strain when obtaining wealth.

name: Let's Ride
description: Once per round mount dismount from vehicle or animal or move position. Suffer no damage from short-range falls.

name: Museum Worthy
description: Once per session make Hard Knowledge check to ascertain information about relic ruin or history.

name: Net Search
description: With Network access upgrade next Knowledge check twice and downgrade its difficulty once. GM spends despair for false information.

name: Nocturnal Upbringing
description: Character gains Perception or Stealth as career skill. Remove setback from checks due to darkness.

name: Null Gravity Adept
description: Character gains Athletics or Coordination as career skill. Spend advantages to heal 3 strain in zero-gravity checks.

name: One with Nature
description: In wilderness make Simple Survival check instead of Discipline or Cool to recover strain.

name: Painful Blow
description: Voluntarily increase difficulty by one. If target suffers wounds target suffers 2 strain per maneuver until end of encounter.

name: Parry
description: After melee hit calculated but before soak suffer 3 strain to reduce damage by two plus ranks. Need Melee weapon.

name: Physician
description: When making Medicine check target heals 1 additional strain per rank.

name: Precision
description: When making Brawl or Ranged check use Cunning instead of Brawn and Agility.

name: Proper Upbringing
description: In polite company suffer strain to add equal advantages to social check. Cannot exceed ranks.

name: Quick Draw
description: Once per round draw or holster weapon as incidental. Reduce weapon's Prepare rating by one minimum one.

name: Quick Strike
description: Add setback per rank to combat checks against targets not yet acted.

name: Rapid Reaction
description: Suffer strain to add equal successes to Vigilance or Cool check. Cannot exceed ranks.

name: Rapid Recovery
description: When healing strain after encounter heal 1 additional strain per rank.

name: Redundant Systems
description: Once per session make Easy Mechanics check to harvest components from functioning device to repair broken one.

name: Reflect
description: After ranged hit calculated but before soak suffer 3 strain to reduce damage by two plus ranks. Need Shield.

name: Resourceful Mechanic
description: When making Mechanics check repair one additional system strain or hull trauma per rank.

name: Sagacious Instruction
description: Character gains Astrocartography or Knowledge skill as career skill. Spend advantages to heal 3 strain when navigating or learning.

name: Second Wind
description: Once per encounter heal strain equal to ranks.

name: Shapeshifter
description: When incapacitated from exceeding strain threshold heal all strain increase Brawn Agility by one reduce Intellect Willpower by one. Deal +1 unarmed damage. Critical 3. Cannot use magic or ranged attacks. Revert after 8 hours or if incapacitated.

name: Shield Slam
description: When attacking minion or rival with shield spend four advantages or triumph to stagger target.

name: Signature Vehicle
description: Choose starship or vehicle silhouette 3 or lower. Upgrade Mechanics checks on it. Apply to new vehicle if lost or destroyed.

name: Skilled Mechanic
description: When making repair check repair 1 additional hull trauma or system strain per rank.

name: Smooth Talker
description: Choose one social skill. Spend triumph to gain additional successes equal to ranks.

name: Solid Repairs
description: Repair +1 hull trauma per rank when repairing starship or vehicle.

name: Soothing Tone
description: Once per encounter make Average Knowledge check to allow beast recover strain equal to successes.

name: Street Fighter
description: When disorienting or knocking prone with Brawl check cause target to suffer wounds equal to ranks in Skullduggery.

name: Surgeon
description: When making Medicine check target heals one additional wound per rank.

name: Subtle
description: When making social check spend success to convey simple message using body language gestures or double entendres.

name: Swift
description: Do not suffer penalties for moving through difficult terrain. Move through at normal speed.

name: Tavern Brawler
description: Add success to Brawl checks and improvised weapon combat checks.

name: Templar
description: Divine is now career skill. Can only cast one spell per encounter.

name: Toughened
description: Each rank increases wound threshold by two.

name: Tri-Maf Contact
description: Character gains Melee or Skullduggery as career skill. Once per session collect small favor from crime group member.

name: Tumble
description: Once per round suffer 2 strain to disengage from all engaged adversaries.

name: Union Member
description: Character gains Athletics Mechanics or Operating as career skill. Once per session collect favor from labor union member.

name: Unremarkable
description: Other characters add failure to checks to find or identify character in crowd.

name: War Veteran
description: Character gains Athletics or Resilience as career skill. Spend advantages to heal 3 strain after combat.

name: Wheel and Deal
description: When selling goods legally gain 10% more currency per rank.

name: Where did I put that?
description: Once per session make Average Cool check. If successful find one previously lost or left behind item.

name: Worlds War Vet
description: Character gains Ranged (Heavy) or Resilience as career skill. Once per session collect favor from military member.

name: Xenoreader
description: Choose one creature category (mammalian aquatic insectoid reptilian anomaly). Add advantages to social checks targeting that category.

name: Years on The Force
description: Character gains Perception or Ranged (Light) as career skill. Once per session collect favor from NAPD or city government member.

name: Adventurer
description: Athletics and Knowledge (Adventuring) are career skills.

name: Aethersprite
description: Once per encounter with Network access make Average Computers check. Reduce difficulty of further Computers and Skulduggery checks by 1 or succeed automatically.

name: Angle the Shields
description: While piloting silhouette 4+ starship make Hard Operating check. Starship suffers system strain and removes setback from incoming checks.

name: Animal Expertise (Hunter)
description: Add setback per rank to beast interaction checks. Add +10 to Critical Injury results per rank.

name: Bad Cop
description: Spend advantages from Coercion or Deception check to upgrade ally's subsequent social check targeting same character.

name: Bard
description: Knowledge (Lore) and Verse are career skills.

name: Barrage
description: Add 1 damage per rank to hit using Ranged (Heavy) or Gunnery at long or extreme range.

name: Basic Military Training
description: Athletics Ranged (Heavy) and Resilience are career skills.

name: Beast Wrangler
description: Add setback per rank to checks to tame or wrangle creatures.

name: Berserk
description: Once per encounter add successes and advantages to melee checks. Opponents add success targeting you. Cannot make ranged attacks. Suffer 6 strain at end.

name: Big Guns
description: Encumbrance threshold is 10 plus Brawn. Reduce Cumbersome rating by 1 minimum 3.

name: Blackmail
description: When NPC exceeds strain spend Story Point to convince them to perform task.

name: Block
description: Must have Parry talent. While wielding shield use Parry against ranged and melee attacks.

name: Blood Sacrifice
description: Must have Dark Insight talent. Before magic check suffer wounds to add equal successes. Cannot exceed ranks.

name: Blooded
description: Add setback per rank to poison venom toxin checks. Reduce poison duration by 1 round per rank minimum 1.

name: Brilliant Casting
description: Spend Story Point when casting spell to add successes equal to ranks in Knowledge.

name: Bulwark
description: Must have Parry talent. While wielding Defensive weapon use Parry against attacks on engaged ally.

name: Burly
description: Reduce weapon Cumbersome and Encumbrance by ranks minimum 1.

name: Called Shot
description: When aiming at specific item or body part do not add setback to check.

name: Chameleon Infiltration
description: Must be Yssaril or have allegiance. Spend advantages from Stealth check to add to next combat check.

name: Chill of Nordros
description: Cannot have Flames of Kellos. When casting Attack spell add Ice effect without increasing difficulty. Never add Fire.

name: Code Slinger
description: When activating icebreaker can leave one other active. May have two icebreakers active at once.

name: Combat Medicine
description: Before Medicine check add successes equal to ranks to results. Target suffers 2 strain per rank after.

name: Combined Arms
description: While engaged with enemy GM cannot spend despair to cause hit from ally's ranged attack.

name: Command
description: Add setback per rank to Leadership checks. Affected targets add setback to Discipline for 24 hours.

name: Confidence
description: Decrease difficulty of fear Discipline checks by 1 per rank minimum Easy.

name: Containment
description: Character and allies within short range spend advantage on failed combat checks to inflict strain per rank. Once per round.

name: Coordinated Assault
description: Once per turn have allies engaged add success to combat checks until end of next turn. Range increases per rank.

name: Counteroffer
description: Once per session choose non-nemesis adversary within medium range. Make opposed Negotiation vs Discipline check. If successful stagger target. Spend triumph to make ally until end of encounter.

name: Cutting Question
description: Once per encounter when making Coercion check use Deception skill instead.

name: Daring Aviator
description: Before Driving or Piloting check add help to results to add equal successes. Cannot exceed ranks.

name: Debilitating Shot
description: Upon successful starship or vehicle weapon attack spend advantages to reduce max speed by 1.

name: Deceptive Taunt
description: Once per session make opposed Deception check. If successful adversary must attack character during next turn.

name: Defensive Stance
description: Once per round suffer strain up to ranks to upgrade difficulty of melee checks until end of next turn.

name: Defensive Sysops (Improved)
description: Must have Defensive Sysops talent. Instead of setbacks add failure and help to check results.

name: Determined Driver
description: Spend Story Point to heal system strain on vehicle equal to ranks in appropriate skill.

name: Dirty Tricks
description: After inflicting Critical Injury upgrade difficulty of adversary's next check.

name: Disorient
description: After successful combat check spend advantages to disorient target for rounds equal to ranks.

name: Distracting Behavior
description: Make maneuver suffering strain up to Cunning. Until next turn equal NPCs suffer help on checks.

name: Dominion of the Dimora
description: Cannot have Favor of the Fae. When casting Attack spell add Impact effect without increasing difficulty. Never add Manipulative.

name: Driven to Succeed
description: Must be Human Winnu or have allegiance. Once per session spend advantages or triumph to move Story Points to players' pool.

name: Dual Wielder
description: Once per round decrease difficulty of next combined combat check by one.

name: Dynamic Fire
description: When making ranged attack while engaged suffer 2 strain to reduce ranged modifier by 1.

name: Encouraging Song
description: With musical instrument make Average Charm or Verse check. Each success grants ally setback. Each advantage heals 1 strain.

name: Ensorcelled (Improved)
description: Must have Ensorcelled talent with two+ ranks in magic skill. Add successes and advantages to next social check. Appearance noticeably enhanced.

name: Exploit
description: When making Ranged or Melee (Light) check suffer 2 strain to add Ensnare quality. Rating equals ranks.

name: Fan the Hammer
description: Once per encounter before pistol combat check add Auto-fire quality. Weapon runs out of ammo.

name: Fancy Paint Job
description: Must have Signature Vehicle talent. Upgrade Charm Deception Negotiation checks in vehicle's presence.

name: Favor of the Fae
description: Cannot have Dominion of the Dimora. When casting Attack spell add Manipulative effect without increasing difficulty. Never add Impact.

name: Fearsome
description: When adversary becomes engaged force fear check with difficulty equal to ranks.

name: Fine Tuning
description: When reducing system strain reduce 1 additional per rank.

name: Flames of Kellos
description: Cannot have Chill of Nordros. When casting Attack spell add Fire effect without increasing difficulty. Never add Ice.

name: Flash of Insight
description: When knowledge check generates triumph roll two dice and add results in addition to spending triumph.

name: Friends in Low Places
description: Must be Saar or have allegiance. Once per session on populated world make Easy Streetwise check. Obtain item or service with rarity up to 2x successes.

name: Go Without
description: Once per session count as having right tools for next check this turn.

name: Gunslinger Diplomacy
description: If armed conspicuously display weapon and add successes and advantages to next social check.

name: Good Cop
description: Spend advantages from Charm or Negotiation check to upgrade ally's subsequent social check targeting same character.

name: Grapple
description: Suffer 2 strain to make enemies spend two maneuvers to disengage.

name: Hard-Headed
description: When staggered or disoriented make Daunting Discipline check to remove status. Reduce difficulty per rank.

name: Haughty Demeanor
description: Other characters add help to social checks targeting you.

name: Headbutt
description: Once per encounter suffer two wounds to knock engaged target prone and disorient until end of next round.

name: Heightened Awareness
description: Allies within short range add setback to Perception Vigilance checks. Engaged allies add two setbacks.

name: Heroic Recovery
description: Choose one characteristic. Once per encounter spend Story Point to heal strain equal to characteristic rating.

name: Hidden Storage (Improved)
description: Use Hidden Storage to store item within modified body via cybernetics surgery or prosthetics.

name: Hold Together
description: Spend Story Point immediately after vehicle damage to turn it into system strain.

name: Hunter
description: Knowledge (Geography) Ranged and Survival are career skills.

name: Hunter's Quarry
description: Make Hard Survival check to upgrade attacks against target within long range until end of next turn.

name: Impaling Strike
description: When inflicting Critical Injury with melee weapon immobilize target until end of next turn.

name: Improvised Defenses
description: Make Average Survival check to fashion defenses for 4 characters providing cover. Spend advantages or triumph to increase ranged defense to 2.

name: Inspiration
description: Once per encounter spend Story Point to tell ally to perform task. If know motivation reroll up to three dice.

name: Inspiring Rhetoric
description: Make Average Leadership check. Each success heals one ally strain. Each advantage heals one additional.

name: Inventor
description: When constructing items add setback equal to ranks. May attempt to reconstruct devices without plans.

name: Knockdown
description: After melee hit spend triumph to knock target prone.

name: Know the Enemy
description: Use appropriate Knowledge skill when making initiative checks.

name: Know-It-All
description: Once per session perfectly recall important fact as if Story Point spent.

name: Known Schematic
description: Once per session make Hard Knowledge check to gain familiarity with building or ship design.

name: Knows the Ropes
description: Add setback per Skullduggery ranks to escape restraint checks. Spend triumph to free allies within short range.

name: Leverage
description: Once per encounter spend Story Point to target ally within hearing range. If know Flaw or Fear force target to perform action next turn.

name: Long Game
description: Increase agenda benchmarks by 2. When completing agenda double received rewards.

name: Loom
description: When ally makes successful Charm Deception Negotiation check add success per Coercion rank.

name: Lucky Strike
description: Choose characteristic. After successful combat check spend Story Point to add damage equal to characteristic ranks.

name: Multiple Opponents
description: Add setback to Brawl and Melee checks when engaged with multiple opponents.

name: Mystic Theurge
description: Choose magic skill as career skill. Can only use once per encounter.

name: Natural Communion
description: When casting Conjure spell always add Summon Ally effect without increasing difficulty. Summon natural animals.

name: Net Hunter
description: When successfully tracing character during Network encounter gain one additional trace.

name: Overheat
description: Must be Hylar Gashlai or have allegiance. When making equipment check add successes and advantages. Equipment becomes damaged one step or vehicle suffers 2 strain.

name: Overstocked Ammo
description: Must have Signature Vehicle talent. Increase Limited Ammo on mounted weapons by 1 per rank.

name: Parkour!
description: Once per round suffer 1 strain to move to location within short range. Must have object or path to move along.

name: Physical Training
description: Add setback per rank to Athletics and Resilience checks.

name: Precision Strike
description: When making Brawl or Melee check remove setback per rank from pool and suffer 1 strain per removed setback then add equal successes.

name: Pride and Joy
description: Choose vehicle silhouette 4+. Upgrade social checks while within short range.

name: Probing Question
description: If know opponent's Flaw or Fear when inflicting strain with social skill opponent suffers 3 additional strain.

name: Quick Draw (Improved)
description: Must have Quick Draw talent. May use Quick Draw twice per round. Reduce prepare rating by 2 minimum 1.

name: Quick Fix
description: Spend Story Point to temporarily repair damaged item. Works without penalty for rounds equal to Mechanics ranks then damaged one additional step.

name: Reckless Charge
description: After using maneuver to engage suffer 2 strain to add successes and help to next Brawl Melee (Light) or Melee (Heavy) check.

name: Reconstruct the Scene
description: Make Hard Perception check to identify physical characteristics of person present at scene within 24 hours.

name: Researcher
description: On successful Knowledge check character and allies gain automatic advantage per rank until end of next turn.

name: Resist Disarm
description: Suffer 2 strain to avoid being disarmed or weapon damaged or destroyed.

name: Runic Lore
description: Knowledge (Lore) and Runes are career skills.

name: Scathing Tirade
description: Make Average Coercion check. Each success inflicts 1 strain on enemy. Each advantage inflicts 1 additional strain.

name: Selective Detonation
description: With Blast quality weapon spend advantage to exclude 1 target per rank from explosion.

name: Sense Emotions
description: Add setback to all Charm Coercion and Deception checks.

name: Shapeshifter (Improved)
description: Once per session make Hard Discipline check to trigger Shapeshifter or avoid triggering when exceeding strain.

name: Shepherding Command
description: Must be Xxcha Titan or have allegiance. Once per encounter when ally within short range targeted by attack reduce damage by ranks in Leadership before soak.

name: Shortcut
description: During chase add setback per rank to catch or escape checks.

name: Side-Step
description: Once per round suffer strain up to ranks to upgrade ranged attack difficulty until end of next turn.

name: Signature Spell
description: Choose signature spell combination. Reduce difficulty of casting signature spell by one.

name: Sneak Attack
description: When making Melee check use Cunning instead of Brawn. Add Cunning to weapon damage.

name: Sound Investments
description: At beginning of session receive aurei equal to ranks x 100.

name: Speaks Binary
description: When directing non-sentient artificial life grant setback per rank on checks.

name: Special Use Permit
description: Do not treat Ranged (Heavy) weapons as restricted. Can carry without arrest.

name: Stalker
description: Add setback per rank to all Stealth and Coordination checks.

name: Strong Arm
description: Treat thrown weapons as having 1 greater range.

name: Stunning Blow
description: While making Melee checks inflict damage as strain instead of wounds. Does not ignore soak.

name: Sustained Fire
description: After Ranged check spend advantages or triumph to add successes per rank to same target until end of encounter.

name: Tactical Focus
description: When making Ranged (Heavy) check if did not ready or stow weapon this turn add success.

name: Technical Aptitude
description: When making Computer check spend advantages or triumph to reduce time by 50%.

name: Templar (Improved)
description: Must have Templar talent. When casting Divine spell do not add setback for heavy armor shield or no free hand.

name: Threaten
description: After adversary within short range damages ally suffer 3 strain to inflict strain equal to Coercion ranks. Range increases per rank.

name: Time to Go
description: Spend Story Point to perform Move maneuver as incidental to move into cover or blast range.

name: Tinkerer
description: Add 1 hard point to items equal to ranks. Each item modified once.

name: Touch of Fate
description: Once per session add two setbacks to any check.

name: Two-Handed Stance
description: When making Ranged (Light) check with nothing in other hand add success.

name: Unarmed Parry
description: May Parry while unarmed. Reduce strain cost to 1 minimum. May use for Reflect vs thrown weapons per GM.

name: Uncanny Senses
description: Add setback per rank to all Perception and Vigilance checks.

name: Undercity Contacts
description: Once per session spend Story Point to learn if target character is in New Angeles and location.

name: Vehicle Combat Training
description: Gunnery and Driving become career skills.

name: Well Read
description: Choose any 3 Knowledge skills. Permanently become career skills.

name: Well-Travelled
description: Knowledge (Geography) Negotiation and Vigilance are career skills.

name: Wraithbane
description: Count weapon's Critical rating as one lower minimum 1 against undead.

name: Aethersprite (Improved)
description: Must have Aethersprite talent. Spend Story Point to make self and 5 allies invisible to electronic sensors for rounds equal to Computers ranks.

name: Alchemical Arts
description: After poison crafting check suffer strain up to 2x ranks. For every 2 strain add successes and advantages.

name: Ambush
description: Once per round while benefiting from cover add damage equal to Stealth skill to successful combat check.

name: Animal Companion
description: Bond with silhouette 0 animal. Bond persists as chosen. Animal follows and acts per direction. Silhouette increases per rank.

name: Applied Research
description: Before knowledge check use Intellect instead of required skill and characteristic. Use per session equal to ranks.

name: Armor Master (Improved)
description: Must have Armor Master talent. When wearing armor with +2 soak increase defense by 1.

name: Backstab
description: Attack unaware adversary with Melee (Light) using Skullduggery skill. Each uncanceled success adds +2 damage.

name: Bad Habit
description: Become disoriented for remainder of encounter. At start of each turn heal 2 strain if disoriented.

name: Bad Press
description: Once per session make Hard Deception check. Organization members strain thresholds reduced by 1 plus 1 per success until session end.

name: Barrel Roll
description: While piloting silhouette 3 or less starfighter when hit suffered make check. Vehicle suffers 3 system strain to reduce damage by Piloting ranks.

name: Battle Casting
description: Do not add setback to magic checks for heavy armor shield or no free hand.

name: Blind Spot
description: Character and allies within short range add automatic advantage to combat checks while benefiting from cover.

name: Blooded (Improved)
description: Make Hard Resilience check to immediately recover from all poisons and drugs. Reduce difficulty per rank.

name: Bodyguard
description: Once per round suffer strain up to ranks to upgrade difficulty of melee checks on engaged ally.

name: Capital Sendoff
description: Target two ships or vehicles at Close range. Make Hard Cool check to cause minor collision.

name: Cavalier
description: While riding battle mount direct mount to perform action once per round.

name: Ccrysusian Methodology
description: Once per session when targeted by social check reduce strain by Negotiation ranks minimum 1. Each rank increases uses per session.

name: Center of Being
description: While wielding Defensive weapon perform maneuver. Critical rating counts as 1 higher per rank until next turn.

name: Combat Veteran
description: Add setback to Brawl and Discipline checks.

name: Confidence (Improved)
description: Must have Confidence talent. Spend advantage on fear check so allies within short range making fear check add automatic successes.

name: Congenial
description: Suffer strain up to ranks to downgrade Charm or Negotiation difficulty or upgrade when targeted.

name: Constant Vigilance
description: Always use Vigilance when making initiative checks.

name: Counterattack
description: Must have Parry talent. When using Parry to hit attacker activate weapon quality as if spent advantages.

name: Creative Killer
description: Reduce improvised weapon critical rating by 2 minimum 1.

name: Cunning Persona
description: Suffer 2 strain to make Charm check using Cunning instead of Presence.

name: Cunning Snare
description: Once per encounter as action create trap. Others moving to engaged range must make opposed Vigilance vs Survival check.

name: Customized Cooling Unit
description: Must have Signature Vehicle talent. Increase system strain threshold by 2 per rank.

name: Daring Turn
description: When opponent has advantage on piloted vehicle suffer 2 strain to remove effects.

name: Deliberate Tactics
description: Must be Titan Xxcha or have allegiance. Take no maneuvers or actions to reduce strain to 0 until next turn and add advantages to combat checks.

name: Disarm
description: Spend triumph or advantages with successful Brawl or Melee check to disarm opponent.

name: Disarming Smile
description: Make opposed Charm check against target within short range to lower all defenses until encounter end.

name: Dissonance
description: With musical instrument make Average Charm or Verse check. Each success inflicts 1 wound. Each advantage inflicts 1 additional.

name: Distinctive Style
description: When making Computers hacking check before rolling add successes and help to results.

name: Dockyard Expertise
description: At dry dock make Average Knowledge check. Reduce repair cost and time by 20% per rank minimum 100 units and 1 day.

name: Dodge
description: When targeted by combat check suffer strain up to ranks to upgrade difficulty equal to strain.

name: Double or Nothing
description: Suffer 2 strain to increase check difficulty by one. After canceling symbols double remaining advantages.

name: Druid
description: When casting Conjure with Primal skill always add Summon Ally effect. Must summon living animal. Animal remains even without concentrate.

name: Dual Blow
description: When resolving combined melee attack suffer 3 strain to hit with secondary weapon instead of spending advantages.

name: Dual Strike
description: When resolving combined melee attack suffer 2 strain to hit with secondary weapon instead of spending advantages.

name: Dumb Luck
description: Once per session spend Story Point after Critical Injury but before rolling. Opponent rolls two results and you choose.

name: Eagle Eyes
description: Once per encounter before ranged combat check increase weapon range by one band to maximum extreme.

name: Easy Prey
description: Suffer 3 strain until next turn. Character and allies within short range add two setbacks to immobilized target checks.

name: Elementalist (Improved)
description: Must have Elementalist talent. Gain immunity based on element (fire heat water air earth) and add effect without increasing difficulty.

name: Encoded Communique
description: Upgrade difficulty to decrypt coded messages by Computers ranks.

name: Encouraging Words
description: After engaged ally fails check suffer 1 strain to assist next check this encounter.

name: Ensorcelled (Improved)
description: Must have Ensorcelled with 2+ magic ranks. Once per session force enemies within medium range to make Hard Discipline check. Appearance noticeably enhanced.

name: Exhaustive Questioning
description: When successful social check on captured enemy within short range reduce strain threshold by 2. Spend advantage to inflict 1 strain.

name: Expert Gunner
description: When making Gunnery check suffer 3 strain to reduce advantages needed to activate weapon qualities by 1 minimum 1.

name: Expert Scrapper
description: Must be Saar or have allegiance. Once per encounter engaged with vehicle make Mechanics check. Vehicle suffers 1 hull trauma per success and Critical Hit per triumph.

name: Explosive Casting
description: When casting Attack spell treat Blast rating as 2x ranks. Spend Story Point to trigger Blast instead of advantages.

name: Extended Reach
description: While armed with two-handed melee weapon suffer 1 strain to target up to short range instead of engaged.

name: Eye for Detail
description: After Mechanics or Computers check suffer strain up to ranks to convert that many successes to advantages.

name: Face of the Wild
description: When casting transform spell with Primal skill spend Story Point to maintain until encounter end without concentrate.

name: Fear the Shadows
description: Once per session make Hard Deception check to force minion group or rival to flee.

name: Fearsome Rep
description: Add advantage to Coercion check results per rank.

name: Feint
description: Spend triumph or advantages from missed melee attack to upgrade opponent's next attack difficulty per rank.

name: Feral Strength
description: Add 1 damage per rank to melee or Brawl hits.

name: Field Commander
description: Make Average Leadership check. Allies equal to Presence may suffer 1 strain to perform maneuver out of turn.

name: Fire Control
description: All starship or vehicle combat checks count target silhouette as one higher until next turn.

name: Forgot to Count?
description: When opponent makes ranged check spend help to cause weapon to run out of ammo.

name: Form on Me
description: Allies equal to Leadership ranks in short range gain Gain the Advantage benefits.

name: Formation Tactics
description: Make Hard Leadership check. Allies within short range equal to successes upgrade attack difficulty until end of next turn.

name: Fortified Structure
description: Must have Signature Vehicle talent. Increase hull trauma threshold by 1 per rank.

name: Frenzied Attack
description: When making Melee or Brawl check suffer strain up to ranks to upgrade attack equal times.

name: Full Throttle
description: Make Hard Piloting or Driving check. Vehicle top speed increases by 1 maximum 5 for rounds equal to Cunning.

name: Greased Palms
description: Before social check spend up to 50 credits per rank to upgrade ability once per 50 spent.

name: Grenadier
description: When making Blast weapon check spend Story Point to trigger Blast instead of advantages. Treat grenades as medium range.

name: Harass
description: When animal companion makes successful combat check forgo damage to upgrade target's next difficulty.

name: Hard-Boiled
description: When recovering strain at encounter end make Simple Resilience check instead. Heal 1 strain per success and 1 wound per advantage.

name: Heroic Resilience
description: After attack hits but before damage spend Story Point to increase soak by Resilience ranks.

name: Heroic Will
description: Choose two characteristics. Spend Story Point to ignore Critical Injury effects on those characteristics until end of encounter.

name: Hindering Shot
description: Spend Story Point and increase next Gunnery check difficulty by 1. If deals damage target suffers system strain equal to speed.

name: Hold It Steady
description: Before Auto-fire check use talent without increasing difficulty. Trigger additional hits cost 2 strain each.

name: Hunter's Quarry (Improved)
description: Must have Hunter's Quarry talent. Suffer 2 strain to perform Hunter's Quarry as maneuver.

name: Informant
description: Once per session reveal contact who can shed light on chosen subject.

name: Innate Focus
description: Without magic implement increase base damage of Attack spells by 2. Decrease difficulty by one or increase strain by one.

name: Inspiring Rhetoric (Improved)
description: Must have Inspiring Rhetoric talent. Allies affected add setback to all checks for rounds equal to Leadership ranks.

name: Interjection
description: After social check suffer 3 strain. Make Average Vigilance check to add successes or failures and advantages or help.

name: Intense Focus
description: Perform maneuver suffer 1 strain to upgrade next skill check once.

name: Intimidating
description: Suffer strain up to ranks to downgrade Coercion difficulty or upgrade when targeted.

name: Iron Body
description: Remove setback per rank from Coordination and Resilience checks. Reduce unarmed critical by 1 per rank minimum 1.

name: Jury Rigged
description: Choose personal weapon or armor per rank. Increase weapon damage by 1 or reduce critical by 1 or decrease encumbrance by 2 minimum 1.

name: Justice of the Citadel
description: Once per round on turn suffer 3 strain to add damage equal to Discipline ranks to melee hit.

name: Larger Project
description: Must have Signature Vehicle talent. Signature Vehicle can be 1 silhouette larger per rank.

name: Laugh It Off
description: When targeted by social check spend help or despair to reduce strain. Targeter suffers equal strain.

name: Lethal Blows
description: Add +10 per rank to Critical Injury results.

name: Made You Talk
description: Once per session make opposed social check on captured enemy within short range adding setback per 2 strain suffered.

name: Martial Grace
description: Once per round suffer 3 strain to add damage equal to Coordination ranks to Brawl hit.

name: Martial Weapons Master
description: With Melee weapon make Average check. Force engaged target to drop weapon or move one range band.

name: Master of Illusion
description: After successful Mask spell spend Story Point to maintain until encounter end. Two Story Points for session end.

name: Master of the Blade
description: Must be Hacan Letnev N'orr or have allegiance. Add failures to melee check results when engaged with multiple enemies.

name: Mercantile Savant
description: Must be Naaz-Rokha Hacan or have allegiance. Once per session spend Story Point to reduce item cost by 50% or increase reward by 50%.

name: Mind Bender
description: Must be Druaa or have allegiance. Once per session spend Story Point make opposed Discipline vs Vigilance. Make target adopt emotional state or believe false information.

name: Natural
description: Choose two skills. Once per session reroll check using one of those skills.

name: Net Warrior
description: While accessing system via brain-machine interface make opposed Computers vs Computers check. Target suffers 1 strain per success and 1 wound if using interface.

name: Nimble
description: At turn start spend Story Point to perform Move maneuver as incidental. One additional move maneuver allowed.

name: No Escape
description: Spend advantages from Coercion or help from foe's Discipline. Target cannot perform free maneuver next turn.

name: Nobody's Fool
description: Upgrade incoming Charm Coercion Deception difficulty once per rank.

name: Not Even in Death
description: Must be N'orr Shikrai or have allegiance. When incapacitated from wounds spend Story Point to immediately make combat check.

name: Opportunist
description: Choose non-combat non-magic skill. Suffer strain up to ranks to convert equal successes to advantages.

name: Outside the Box
description: Choose characteristic. Once per session make check using that characteristic instead of linked one.

name: Overwhelm Defenses
description: Upon unsuccessful starship or vehicle attack spend advantages per rank to reduce defense by 1 per pair.

name: Painkiller Specialization
description: When using painkillers target heals one additional wound per rank. Sixth painkiller still has no effect.

name: Parry (Improved)
description: Must have Parry talent. When using Parry to reduce damage spend despair or help to automatically hit attacker.

name: Pin
description: Make opposed Athletics check to immobilize engaged opponent until end of next turn. Spend triumph to extend one round.

name: Plausible Deniability
description: Make Hard Coercion check to convince bystanders equal to Willpower to depart quietly.

name: Primacy
description: Must be Letnev Winnu or have allegiance. Once per session upgrade non-Presence checks by Presence rating.

name: Point Blank
description: Add 1 damage per rank to ranged checks at short range or engaged.

name: Potent Concoctions
description: When Alchemy check generates triumph roll additional die and add results. Each effect once per check.

name: Powerful Blast
description: Increase Blast damage by +1 per rank.

name: Precise Archery
description: When making ranged check targeting character engaged with ally downgrade difficulty once.

name: Preemptive Avoidance
description: Spend Story Point to disengage from engaged enemy.

name: Pressure Point
description: When making unarmed Brawl check deal strain damage instead and inflict additional strain equal to Medicine ranks.

name: Pride and Joy (Improved)
description: While inside Pride and Joy recover +1 strain. Spend advantage to heal ally 1 strain.

name: Rapid Archery
description: While armed with bow suffer 2 strain to gain Linked quality with value equal to Ranged ranks.

name: Raptor's Flight
description: Must be Druaa Shikrai or have allegiance. Make Hard Piloting check to change vehicle speed instantly. Spend advantages to increase difficulty of attacks.

name: Reflect (Improved)
description: Must have Reflect talent. When reflecting hit with despair or help hit one target in medium range with same damage.

name: Resist Questioning
description: When targeted by social check suffer 2 strain adding setback. If fails spend despair to provide false information they believe.

name: Resourceful Refit
description: Make Average Mechanics check to scavenge old attachment to construct new reducing price.

name: Scathing Tirade (Improved)
description: Must have Scathing Tirade talent. Enemies affected add setback to checks for rounds equal to Coercion ranks.

name: Scything Strike
description: Unarmed Brawl attacks gain Pierce quality with rating equal to ranks.

name: Seize the Initiative
description: Once per session make Hard Athletics check as maneuver. On success other PCs may take turns.

name: Sense Advantage
description: Once per session add two setbacks to 1 NPC check.

name: Share Pain
description: When animal companion suffers wounds reduce to half then character suffers equal wounds.

name: Shockwave
description: Treat Melee (Heavy) weapons as possessing Blast quality with rating equal to ranks. Don't suffer weapon's Blast damage.

name: Shortcut (Improved)
description: Must have Shortcut talent. During chase suffer 2 strain to add successes per rank.

name: Skilled Teacher
description: Before ally within short range skill check if ally has fewer ranks suffer strain up to ranks to add equal successes.

name: Smart Handling
description: Once per session aboard silhouette 4+ ship make Smart Handling action making Hard Knowledge check. Ship handling increases by 2 plus 1 per advantage maximum +4.

name: Snare
description: Once per session make Hard Computers check. Once per encounter spend Story Point to force character to make Daunting Vigilance check. If fail stagger until end of next turn.

name: Solo Flight
description: Before Operating check increase difficulty by 1 to use Piloting skill. Operate multi-pilot vehicle alone.

name: Sorry About the Mess
description: Decrease weapon Critical Rating by 1 minimum 1 against targets not yet acted.

name: Spec Ops Elimination
description: Must be Human Yssaril or have allegiance. After successful combat against unaware target inflict Critical Injury without spending advantages.

name: Spur
description: Make Hard Riding check to increase beast top speed by 1. Beast suffers 2 strain every round spurred.

name: Studious Plotting
description: When making Streetwise or Survival navigation check use Intellect instead of Cunning.

name: Stunning Blow (Improved)
description: Must have Stunning Blow talent. When dealing strain damage spend triumph to stagger target per triumph.

name: Sunder Expertise
description: Each advantage spent to activate Sunder quality damages item two steps instead of one.

name: Suppressing Fire
description: If not making combat check target one character within long range. Target upgrades ranged difficulty once. Affect one additional per rank.

name: Takedown
description: Make opposed Brawl vs Resilience against engaged opponent. If succeeds knock prone and immobilize until end of next turn.

name: Time to Go (Improved)
description: Must have Time to Go talent. When activating allow one engaged ally to perform Move maneuver as incidental.

name: Toughened (Improved)
description: Once per session heal wounds equal to Toughened ranks.

name: Tricky Target
description: Count piloted vehicle or starship silhouette as 1 lower when attacked.

name: Trust the Captain
description: Make Hard Leadership check. If successful allies within short range increase Discipline ranks until encounter end.

name: Tuned Maneuvering Thrusters
description: Must have Signature Vehicle talent. Increase Signature Vehicle handling by 1 per rank.

name: Twisted Words
description: When incoming check generates help or despair suffer 1 strain to inflict strain equal to Coercion ranks.

name: Undercity Contacts (Improved)
description: Must have Undercity Contacts talent. Spend two Story Points to learn target's specific location.

name: University Training
description: Must be Hylar or have allegiance. Once per encounter make Intellect skill check as maneuver and add successes.

name: Unremarkable (Improved)
description: Extend Unremarkable effects to allies within short range equal to Deception ranks.

name: Up the Ante
description: When gambling win 10% more credits per rank.

name: Valuable Facts
description: Once per encounter make Average Knowledge check. If successful add triumph to ally check during encounter.

name: Well Rounded
description: Choose 2 non-magic skills. Permanently become career skills.

name: You Owe Me One
description: Once per session spend two Story Points to have NPC owe character favor.

name: A Step Ahead
description: Once per session suffer 2 strain to count Cunning as 1 higher for remainder of encounter.

name: AetherSprite (Supreme)
description: Must have Aethersprite talent. Make Hard Computers check to falsify major distraction. Opponents ignore characters and leave installations unguarded.

name: Analyze Data
description: Once per session after capturing data make Average Knowledge check. Add automatic successes equal to ranks to related check.

name: Back-to-Back
description: While engaged with allies add setback to combat checks. Cumulative maximum two setbacks.

name: Beam Fighter
description: When using Pierce beam weapon lose that quality to assign additional hits from weapon equal to Pierce value.

name: Better Luck Next Time
description: Make Hard Cool check to force competitor to suffer major misfortune.

name: Bodyguard (Improved)
description: Must have Bodyguard talent. Once per session when protected ally suffers hit suffer it instead.

name: Bolstered Armor
description: Must have Signature Vehicle talent. Increase armor value by 1 per rank.

name: Brilliant Evasion
description: Once per vehicle encounter make opposed Driving or Piloting check. Stop opponent attacking for rounds equal to Agility.

name: Burn Through
description: After successful break ice action suffer 3 strain to perform second override ice as incidental.

name: By the Book
description: Once per encounter before combat check suffer 2 strain to add success per rank.

name: Can't We Talk About This?
description: Make opposed Charm or Deception vs Discipline against non-nemesis within medium range. Target cannot attack until end of next turn. Spend advantages to extend or triumph for allies.

name: Capital Sendoff (Improved)
description: Must have Capital Sendoff talent. Targets suffer major collision.

name: Careful Planning
description: Once per session introduce fact into narrative as if Story Point spent.

name: Center of Being (Improved)
description: Suffer 1 strain to use Center of Being maneuver as incidental.

name: Combat Command
description: When making Initiative check make Simple Leadership check instead. Spend triumph to add successes to all allies' first round checks.

name: Commanding Presence
description: Once per session make opposed Cool vs Discipline check to force target to leave encounter.

name: Comrades in Arms
description: Once per encounter make Hard Discipline check. Allies up to Presence within short range gain +1 defense.

name: Conduit
description: Once per encounter spend Story Point to perform magic action as maneuver.

name: Deadeye
description: After inflicting Critical Injury with ranged weapon suffer 2 strain to select any Critical Injury of same severity.

name: Deadly Accuracy
description: Choose combat skill. Add damage equal to ranks to hit from that skill. Cannot choose same skill twice.

name: Death Rage
description: Add +2 damage to melee attacks per Critical Injury suffered.

name: Defensive
description: Each rank increases melee and ranged defense by one.

name: Defensive Driving
description: Increase vehicle defense by 1 per rank piloted.

name: Deflection
description: Must have Reflect talent. After using Reflect spend Story Point to Move as incidental to engage opponent.

name: Discredit
description: Once per encounter make Hard Deception check to upgrade one character's social checks difficulty once plus once per pair of advantages until encounter end.

name: Distracting Behavior (Improved)
description: Must have Distracting Behavior talent. Inflict two help on NPC checks when NPCs target allies.

name: Dodge (Improved)
description: When performing Dodge may make Move maneuver as out-of-turn incidental after attack resolves.

name: Don't Shoot!
description: Once per session make Hard Charm check. Cannot be target of combat checks until encounter end or making combat check.

name: Dormant Personality Overlay
description: Select three skills with one or no ranks. Once per session spend Story Point. Count as 4 ranks in those skills until end of encounter. Suffer 1 strain at turn start.

name: Double or Nothing (Improved)
description: Must have Double or Nothing talent. When performing also double remaining successes.

name: Double-Talk
description: Spend advantages or triumph from successful Charm or Deception to disorient opponents within short range equal to Presence.

name: Elementary
description: Once per session make Hard Perception check at crime scene. Identify all physical characteristics of one person per check success.

name: Elementalist (Supreme)
description: Must have Elementalist talent. When casting Augment Barrier or Transform spell targets gain Elementalist (Improved) ability for duration.

name: Enduring
description: Each rank increases soak value by one.

name: Field Commander (Improved)
description: Must have Field Commander talent. Affect allies equal to 2x Presence. Spend triumph to allow ally to perform action instead of maneuver.

name: Flicker Step
description: When casting Arcana spell spend advantages or triumph to vanish and reappear within long range.

name: Fly Quiet
description: Once per encounter make Hard Piloting or Operating check. Ship vanishes from sensors until firing weapons or defeated.

name: Formation Tactics (Improved)
description: Reduce Formation Tactics difficulty to Average. Spend triumph or advantages to extend effect until encounter end.

name: Fortune Favors the Bold
description: Once per session suffer 2 strain as incidental to flip GM Story Point to Player Story Point.

name: Full Throttle (Improved)
description: Must have Full Throttle talent. Suffer 1 strain to attempt Full Throttle as maneuver with Average difficulty. Top speed increases by 2 instead of 1.

name: Future Sight
description: Must have Nomad allegiance. Once per session after performing action cancel results and perform different action.

name: Holistic Navigation
description: When making Astrocartography check spend Story Point to remove despair or remove help equal to Perception ranks.

name: How Convenient!
description: Once per session make Hard Mechanics check. One device in encounter spontaneously fails.

name: Improvised Position
description: Make Hard Mechanics check spending 12 hours constructing position. Vehicle silhouettes total 4 or less. Provides cover and narrative benefits.

name: In the Know
description: Once per session make opposed Deception vs Vigilance with difficulty downgraded per Deception ranks to make target believe false intelligence.

name: Incite Distraction
description: In crowd or populated area make Average Deception check. Enemies treat area as difficult terrain. Spend triumph for impassable terrain.

name: Incite Rebellion
description: Once per session make Hard Coercion check to cause beings equal to Coercion ranks to become rebellious until encounter end.

name: Inspiring Rhetoric (Supreme)
description: Must have Inspiring Rhetoric talent. Suffer 1 strain to use Inspiring Rhetoric as maneuver instead of action.

name: It's Not that Bad
description: Once per session when ally would suffer Critical Injury make Hard Medicine check to prevent it.

name: Lose Them
description: When followed or chased make Hard Stealth check. Add two setbacks to follow checks. Spend triumph to lose pursuers completely.

name: Mad Inventor
description: Once per session make Mechanics check to cobble together functional equivalent of item. Difficulty based on rarity.

name: Masterful Casting
description: When casting spell spend triumph to trigger up to three different qualities or effects instead of one.

name: Menace
description: Once per round spend maneuver to allow silhouette 2+ creature linked through Animal Companion at short range with enemy to perform Menace. Enemy gains setback.

name: Moving Target
description: If character already acted this round increase ranged defense by 1 per rank.

name: Multitasking
description: Must be Naaz-Rokha or have allegiance. Once per encounter exchange two maneuvers for action to perform two actions.

name: Not Today
description: Must have Signature Vehicle talent. Once per session spend Story Point to save Signature Vehicle from destruction.

name: Offensive Driving
description: While driving or piloting select vehicle within medium range. Make opposed Driving or Piloting check. Roll twice on Critical Hit table choosing which applies to each vehicle.

name: Overbalance
description: After enemy engaged makes combat check spend despair or help to stagger attacker until end of next turn.

name: Overcharge
description: Once per encounter make Hard Mechanics check. Choose cybernetic providing +1 characteristic skill or talent. Provides +2 until encounter end. GM spends despair or help to short out.

name: Parkour! (Improved)
description: Must have Parkour! talent. Once per round suffer 4 strain to move within medium range instead of short range.

name: Polymorph
description: If have Arcana or Divine rank can cast transform spell to transform into magical creatures.

name: Pommel Smash
description: After Melee check with two-handed weapon suffer 3 strain to stagger engaged opponent silhouette 2 or less.

name: Precise Aim
description: Once per round when performing Aim maneuver suffer strain up to ranks. Decrease target defense by 1 per strain.

name: Prey on the Weak
description: Add +1 damage to disoriented target hits per rank.

name: Pride and Joy (Supreme)
description: Once per session inside Pride and Joy reduce silhouette by 2 minimum 0 for current and following round.

name: Prime Positions
description: When character or ally takes cover increase ranged attack soak by 1 per rank.

name: Prophetic Aim
description: While benefiting from Aim maneuver despair cannot cause attacks to hit engaged allies.

name: Push the Specs
description: Make Average Knowledge check in ship or vehicle. Top speed increases by 1 for rounds equal to Intellect. Spend advantage to extend or suffer 2 strain.

name: Quick-Witted
description: Once per encounter after social check make Average Vigilance check. Add successes or advantages per Charm ranks or suffer 3 strain.

name: Rain of Death
description: Perform Rain of Death maneuver to ignore Auto-fire increased difficulty this turn.

name: Reflect (Supreme)
description: Must have Reflect talent. If did not make combat check last turn suffer 1 strain to use Reflect.

name: Reinforced Frame
description: Must have Signature Vehicle talent. Signature Vehicle gains Massive 1 quality.

name: Reroute Processors
description: Once per encounter make Average Computers check to reduce one artificial life characteristic by 1 and increase another.

name: Resist Questioning (Improved)
description: When ally within short range targeted by social check use Resist Questioning. If fails spend despair to provide false information they believe.

name: Resolve
description: When involuntarily suffering strain suffer 1 less per rank minimum 1.

name: Savvy Negotiator
description: During debate make Hard Negotiation check. Number of bystanders equal to Presence see opponent's point as unreasonable.

name: Scathing Tirade (Supreme)
description: Must have Scathing Tirade talent. Suffer 1 strain to use Scathing Tirade as maneuver instead of action.

name: Second Chances
description: Once per encounter choose positive dice equal to ranks and reroll.

name: Seen a Lot of Things
description: When failing Knowledge check spend triumph to roll again next turn.

name: Showboat
description: When making vehicle check suffer 2 strain to gain triumph on success or despair on failure.

name: Signature Spell (Improved)
description: Must have Signature Spell talent. Reduce casting difficulty by two instead of one.

name: Skilled Slicer
description: When making Computers check spend triumph to make further Computers checks within system as maneuvers.

name: Strength of Faith
description: Once per session add successes equal to Discipline ranks and advantages equal to Willpower to next Divine check.

name: Speaks Binary (Improved)
description: Must have Speaks Binary talent. NPCs grant additional setback besides other benefits.

name: Spit Fire
description: After successful combined check with two Ranged (Light) weapons allocate additional hits to other targets within range.

name: Spur (Improved)
description: Must have Spur talent. Suffer 1 strain to attempt Spur as maneuver with Average difficulty.

name: Steady Aim
description: Do not lose Aim maneuver benefits performing other maneuvers including moving.

name: Street Smarts
description: Once per session make Formidable Streetwise or Knowledge check to learn vital clue. Reduce difficulty per rank.

name: Supporting Evidence
description: When assisting ally with Charm Deception Leadership or Negotiation check add automatic advantage per rank.

name: Targeted Firepower
description: Once per session identify enemy target and make Hard Knowledge check. Allies within short range add advantage to attacks per success until encounter end.

name: Teleportation
description: With Arcana rank once per session make Daunting Arcana check. Vanish and reappear in known location. Bring 5 allies adding setback per ally. Upgrade difficulty for other planes.

name: That's How It's Done
description: On successful check suffer 1 strain to add advantage to same skill check made by allies equal to Willpower within short range.

name: Trust No One
description: When targeted by social check suffer 1 strain adding failure. If fails with despair perform maneuver as out-of-turn incidental.

name: Unrelenting
description: Once per round after successful Brawl or Melee check suffer 4 strain to make additional melee attack. Increase difficulty by 1 or 2.

name: Unrelenting Skeptic
description: When targeted by Deception check automatically add failure equal to Vigilance ranks.

name: Unstoppable
description: When receiving Critical Injury if percentile roll is 1 do not receive Critical Injury.

name: Urban Combatant
description: When targeted by combat check in urban environment spend Story Point before rolling. Remove setback from check and add equal failure.

name: Venom-Soaked Blade
description: When making poisoned Melee (Light) check treat weapon as possessing Burn 2 quality.

name: Weak Foundation
description: Once per session identify fixed combat structure and make Hard Knowledge check. Character and allies add advantages or successes to attacks until encounter end.

name: You Owe Me One (Improved)
description: Must have You Owe Me One talent. Once per session spend two Story Points to have NPC owe big favor.

name: Against All Odds
description: Once per session after check select failure help or despair. Remove all and add equal successes advantages or triumph.

name: Altered Deal
description: Once per session make Hard Coercion check to radically change previous deal or bargain.

name: Armor Master (Supreme)
description: Must have Armor Master talent. Once per round when suffering Critical Injury suffer 3 strain to reduce by 10 per soak minimum 1.

name: Baleful Gaze
description: When targeted by combat check within medium range spend Story Point to upgrade difficulty per Coercion ranks.

name: Biggest Fan
description: Once per session make Hard Charm check to turn one NPC into biggest fan with various benefits.

name: Bodyguard (Supreme)
description: Must have Bodyguard talent. Bodyguard maneuver protects allies equal to Resilience ranks.

name: Comrades in Arms (Improved)
description: Spend triumph or advantages during Comrades in Arms to give +1 soak or give affected ally +1 soak.

name: Coordination Dodge
description: When targeted by combat check spend Story Point to add failure equal to Coordination ranks.

name: Crucial Point
description: Once per session introduce negotiation concession opponent will do nearly anything to obtain.

name: Crushing Blow
description: Once per session after rolling melee attack before resolving suffer 4 strain. Weapon gains Breach 1 Knockdown and destroys non-Reinforced item.

name: Custom Loadout
description: Must have Signature Vehicle talent. Add one weapon or equipment mount.

name: Dedication
description: Each rank increases one characteristic by one. Cannot exceed 5. Cannot increase same characteristic twice.

name: Dire Animal Companion
description: Must have Animal Companion with Primal rank. Increase Brawn by 1 maximum 5 increase wound threshold by 4. Increase silhouette 0 to 1. Increase Agility or Willpower by 1.

name: Double or Nothing (Supreme)
description: Must have Double or Nothing talent. Also double triumph and despair when performing.

name: Drone Master
description: Control two drones or minion groups maximum Willpower silhouette. Resolve turns individually.

name: Full Throttle (Supreme)
description: Must have Full Throttle talent. Top speed increases by 2 instead of 1.

name: Ghost in The Machine
description: With Network access make Hard Computers check. Select drone vehicle equipment or cybernetics wearer and dictate actions until next turn.

name: Heavy Hitter
description: Once per session spend triumph on successful Ranged (Heavy) or Gunnery check to add Breach 1 or increase existing.

name: Indomitable
description: Once per encounter when would be incapacitated spend Story Point. Not incapacitated until end of next turn.

name: Inside Knowledge
description: Once per session within enemy facility make Hard Skullduggery check. Find personal scale weapon or gain narrative benefit.

name: Inside Person
description: Once per session spend Story Point to establish previously undercover at identified location. Add advantages to related checks until session end.

name: Inspiring Leadership
description: Make Hard Leadership check. Allies not exceeding Presence within short range add successes to next check.

name: Integral Weapon
description: Must be Titan. Choose integral particle beam or integral grav-field. Equipped as palm weapon. Cannot be disarmed.

name: Just Kidding!
description: Once per round spend Story Point to ignore despair from social check.

name: Let's Talk This Over
description: Once per session when combat about to begin make Daunting Charm check. Combat becomes social encounter.

name: Master
description: Choose skill. Once per round suffer 2 strain to reduce next check difficulty by two minimum Easy.

name: Master Demolitionist
description: When resolving personal scale explosive attack spend advantage or triumph to have Blast affect all within short range.

name: Master Driver/Pilot
description: Once per round when piloting suffer 2 strain to perform any action as maneuver.

name: Master Grenadier
description: Decrease advantage cost to activate Blast on any attack by 1 minimum 1.

name: Master Instructor
description: Once per round suffer 2 strain to allow ally within short range count as having character's Discipline ranks.

name: Master Merchant
description: When buying or selling suffer 2 strain to sell for 25% more or buy for 25% less.

name: Master Plan
description: Once per session make Hard Discipline check. Reveal circumstances are part of brilliant plan. Turn one non-nemesis adversary into ally.

name: Mind Breaker
description: Must be Druaa or have allegiance. Once per session spend Story Point make Hard Discipline check. Opponents within medium range suffer strain equal to Willpower. Each success inflicts Compromised Critical Injury.

name: Most Impressive
description: Spend triumph from any check to allow allies not exceeding Presence within short range add advantage to next check.

name: Overcharge (Improved)
description: Must have Overcharge talent. Spend advantages or triumph to immediately take one additional action. Once per check.

name: Overwatch
description: Once per round when opponent attacks ally within long range spend Story Point and despair or help to hit opponent automatically.

name: Power of Darkness
description: Once per session perform maneuver. Increase Wound and Strain Thresholds by 1 per GM Story Point until encounter end.

name: Prepare to be Boarded
description: Once per encounter make opposed Coercion vs Discipline against enemy ship captain. Target suffers 1 strain per success and surrenders if exceeding threshold.

name: Remote Personal Wormhole
description: Must be Creuss or have allegiance. Once per session teleport to seen or visited location instantly. Within extreme range no check. Beyond requires Hard Discipline check.

name: Retribution
description: Once per round when adversary attacks ally within medium range spend Story Point to hit enemy automatically.

name: Ruinous Repartee
description: Once per encounter make opposed Charm or Coercion vs Discipline within medium range. Target suffers strain equal to 2x Presence plus 1 per success.

name: Speaks Binary (Supreme)
description: Once per encounter perform maneuver. NPCs artificial life use character's ranks for one chosen skill.

name: Spur (Supreme)
description: Must have Spur talent. Beast suffers 1 strain instead of 2 when spurred.

name: Superhuman Reflexes
description: Once per session after generating despair on Piloting check cancel and add successes equal to Cool ranks.

name: Teleportation (Improved)
description: Must have Teleportation talent. Make Hard Arcana check to create permanent beacon glyph or circle. Teleport there with Average difficulty. Two beacons per rank.

name: Thorough Assessment
description: Once per session make Hard Knowledge check to gain setback equal to successes to distribute during encounter.

name: Trick of The Light
description: When making laser or maser check spend advantage to inflict one additional hit with same damage.

name: Unrelenting Skeptic (Improved)
description: Must have Unrelenting Skeptic talent. When Deception check fails spend Story Point to add despair.

name: Web of Knowledge
description: Once per session make Average Knowledge (Net) check during Network encounter. Know all ice and characters on accessed system. Spend advantages or triumph to add successes.

name: Whirlwind
description: Suffer 4 strain to make Brawl Melee (Light) or Melee (Heavy) attack against hardest engaged adversary. Each engaged adversary suffers one hit.

name: Void Baron
description: After Piloting check spend advantages or triumph to make combat check as maneuver.

name: Zealous Fire
description: Each time GM spends Story Point character heals 2 strain.

name: Catfall
description: When rolling Athletics or Coordination to reduce fall damage add setback. Reduce fall damage and strain by 1 per rank.

name: Deflect Spell
description: When hit from magic combat check after damage calculated suffer 3 strain to reduce damage by 2 plus ranks.

name: Intuitive Casting
description: Add setback per rank to spell casting when character first PC to act in encounter.

name: Overchannel
description: When casting spell select additional difficulty effects up to ranks. Gain 2 threat per effect instead of increasing difficulty.

name: Respected
description: Choose social group. Downgrade difficulty to interact with members per rank.

name: Specialist Knowledge
description: Choose specific expertise area. Reduce Knowledge check difficulty once for that area.

name: Street Slang
description: When making social check in criminal company suffer strain up to ranks to add equal advantages.

name: Covert Infiltration Training
description: Computers or Skullduggery become career skill. Spend 2 advantages to leave security device undamaged.

name: Adroitness
description: Choose general skill. Reduce time required by 25%.

name: Familiar
description: Choose silhouette 0 creature as familiar. Bond persists as chosen. Familiar acts telepathically but only exchange actions for maneuvers. Assist magic checks from short range.

name: Fighter's Stance
description: When making combat check if performed Guarded Stance suffer 1 strain to ignore penalties.

name: Pact Magic
description: Entered Pact with otherworldly being. Choose one spell type normally cannot cast. Once per encounter cast using any magic skill. GM spends help to inflict wound.

name: Prepared Spell
description: Once per session make spell casting check without suffering strain.

name: Blindsense
description: As long as can hear ignore setback from darkness or blindness within short range.

name: Blood Magic
description: When casting spell take two wounds instead of two strain.

name: Bonded Implement
description: Choose magical implement and bond to it. No other may use. Summon with Hard Magic check. Select new if lost or destroyed.

name: Combat Caster
description: Once per session add Deadly quality to spell without increasing difficulty.

name: Distant Spell
description: Once per session first range enhancement does not increase spell difficulty.

name: Familiar (Improved)
description: Must have Familiar talent. Suffer 2 strain and make Easy Magic check to see using familiar senses one round. Familiar assists with two setbacks.

name: Forbidden Knowledge
description: Once per session suffer strain up to Knowledge ranks to increase Knowledge ranks by equal for spell effect strength determination. Temporary ranks may exceed 5.

name: Life or Death
description: When suffering wounds equal to half threshold add setback to combat checks.

name: Lingering Spell
description: Spend Story Point to make concentration maneuver as incidental.

name: Magic Resistance
description: Spell casters add setback to checks. Add setback when making negative magic effect resistance checks.

name: Maximize Spell
description: Once per session add setback per rank to spell casting check.

name: Overchannel (Improved)
description: Must have Overchannel talent. Add double difficulty effects. Gain one despair per effect instead of increasing difficulty.

name: Pinning Fire
description: Select target within range and make Pinning Fire action. Target adds setback per rank and suffers 1 strain until next turn.

name: Shape Spell
description: When casting Blast spell spend advantage to exclude 1 target per rank.

name: Shield Master
description: While wielding shield take maneuver suffering 1 strain. Shield Defensive and Deflection increase by 1 each until end of next turn.

name: Sneak Attack
description: Once per round when performing Aim maneuver suffer 1 strain to add Pierce 2 or increase Pierce by 1.

name: Turn Undead
description: Force all undead within short range to make fear check with difficulty equal to Discipline. Failed check forces moving away spending maneuvers.

name: Assassin Strike
description: After successful melee check spend Story Point to disengage as incidental.

name: Blood Magic (Improved)
description: Must have Blood Magic talent. Once per encounter suffer additional 2 wounds to add one effect difficulty modifier without increasing difficulty.

name: Faith Healing
description: After Heal spell check change one success to advantage per rank.

name: Familiar (Supreme)
description: Must have Familiar talent. Spend Story Point to use familiar as spell origin point.

name: Finesse (Improved)
description: Must have Finesse talent. Use Agility instead of Brawn for Brawl and Melee (Light) base damage.

name: Flurry of Blows
description: Perform maneuver suffering strain up to Coordination ranks. Gain Linked quality equal to strain on next Melee or Brawl check.

name: Life or Death (Improved)
description: Must have Life or Death talent. When suffering half or more wounds upgrade combat checks ability.

name: Mage Hunter
description: When targeted by curse spell make Daunting Discipline check to remove status. Reduce difficulty per rank.

name: Mystic Theurge (Improved)
description: Must have Mystic Theurge talent. No longer limits magic skill use to once per encounter.

name: Pinning Fire (Improved)
description: Must have Pinning Fire talent. Affect multiple targets equal to Pinning Fire ranks.

name: Quickened Spell
description: Once per session suffer 2 strain to make magic check as maneuver.

name: Reflexive Barrier
description: Once per session when targeted by attack cast Barrier as out-of-turn incidental.

name: Sneak Attack (Improved)
description: Must have Sneak Attack talent. Once per round when Aiming suffer 1 strain to add Vicious 2 or increase Vicious by 1.

name: Vision of the Future
description: Once per session after successful spell spend advantages or triumph to add effect normally increasing difficulty by 1.

name: Barbaric Strength
description: Use Melee (Heavy) weapons one-handed using Melee (Heavy) skill.

name: Blood Magic (Supreme)
description: Once per session suffer critical. Decrease next spell check difficulty by three minimum Average.

name: Bouncing Spell
description: When spell casting fails targeting character or NPC spend triumph or advantages to reroll with new target.

name: Sneak Attack (Supreme)
description: Must have Sneak Attack talent. Once per encounter spend Story Point to add triumph to Attack action without usual successes.

name: Turn Undead (Improved)
description: When taking Turn Undead action flip Story Point to deal 2 strain per rank to failed creatures. Perform Concentration maneuver to maintain subsequent rounds.
